title: U.S. Natural Gas Surges to 3-Year High as Deep Freeze Hits December
summary: U.S. natural gas futures spiked to their highest levels in nearly three years as models now show a frigid first half of December across the Lower 48. title: UK Windfall Tax Blamed for Further North Sea Job Losses
summary: Around 100 offshore jobs are set to be cut by oil and gas firm Harbour Energy amid pressure from UK windfall taxes. title: Digital Asset Treasuries are crypto's latest hype — and maybe its next bubble

title: Exxon Eyes Lukoil’s Huge Iraqi Oilfield as U.S. Sanctions Forces Sales
summary: U.S. supermajor ExxonMobil has approached Iraq’s Oil Ministry to express interest in buying Lukoil’s 75% stake in the West Qurna 2 oilfield, one of the largest in Iraq, Reuters reported on Tuesday, citing multiple official Iraqi sources. title: Decline in Industrial Activity Drives Lower Power Output in India
summary: Electricity generation in India declined last month amid weaker industrial activity and mild weather.
